DataElement.preferredName: Patient BCRP Inhibition Prior Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation related to taking drug products or substances that bring about something, interfere with, or prevent an action or response as outlined in the protocol .

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient ABCG2 wt Allele Inhibition Prior Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Human ABCG2 wild-type allele is located within 4q22 and is approximately 67 kb in length. This allele, which encodes ATP-binding cassette sub-family G member 2 protein, plays a role in transmembrane transport and transcriptional regulation. The allele is thought to play a role in cellular defense and aberrations are thought to play a role in tumor multidrug resistance._The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present._Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: ABCG2 wt Allele Inhibition Prior Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Human ABCG2 wild-type allele is located within 4q22 and is approximately 67 kb in length. This allele, which encodes ATP-binding cassette sub-family G member 2 protein, plays a role in transmembrane transport and transcriptional regulation. The allele is thought to play a role in cellular defense and aberrations are thought to play a role in tumor multidrug resistance.:The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.:An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Human ABCG2 wild-type allele is located within 4q22 and is approximately 67 kb in length. This allele, which encodesbroad substrate specificity ATP-binding cassette transporter ABCG2 protein, plays a role in transmembrane transport and transcriptional regulation. The allele is thought to play a role in cellular defense and aberrations are thought to play a role in tumor multidrug resistance.
The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.
Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient taken BCRP inhibi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient taken BCRP inhibitors [(e.g., cyclosporine, eltrombopag (Promactal)]  in the 2 days prior to starting treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex -1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any medications or substances that are known to be substrates of breast cancer resistance protein (BCRP/ABCG2) and/or organic anion transporting polypeptides (OATP1B1 or OATP1B3) and strong inducers or inhibitors of CYP3A4 within 14 days prior to the first dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any medications or substances that are known to be substrates of breast cancer resistance protein (BCRP/ABCG2) and/or organic anion transporting polypeptides (OATP1B1, OATP1B3 and OATP2B1) and/or organic anion transporters (OAT1 and OAT3) within 14 days prior to the first dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient taking concomitant drugs that are strong inhibitors of BCRP or OATP from 14 days prior to enrollment until the end of the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently receiving any medications or substances that are known to be substrates of breast cancer resistance protein (BCRP)?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.3.28 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002221. ak
